## Overview

The first 60 minutes of the webinar will be a a panel discussion with several awesome panelists representing a variety of career stages and positions, and they will speak to their experiences as mentors/mentees.
The final 30 minutes of the webinar will be a breakout room format where panelists and attendees can discuss their perspectives and network in a small-group setting.

## Presenters

-   Machell Town (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention)
-   Jeffrey Gonzalez (Bureau of Labor Statistics)
-   Brittney Bailey (Amherst College)
-   Eric Daza (Stats-of-1; Evidation)
-   Kendra Plourde (Yale University)
-   Dorcas Washington (University of Cincinnati)
-   Megan McCabe (University of Iowa)
